title: Did Pfizer’s Former ‘Chief Scientist’ Say There Was ‘No Need for Vaccines’?
subtitle: Michael Yeadon last worked at Pfizer a decade ago, and was never the company's "chief scientist." His anti-vaccine argument relies on predictions that never panned out.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Michael Yeadon, who wrote that "there is absolutely no need for vaccines to extinguish the pandemic," was once Pfizer's chief scientific officer.
